CustomField.description:
Set this value if you want to create a pool of available Orgs. Every time an Org is used, a new org will be created behind the scenes, so the next time an org is desired, it is already available.
If this is not set, the Enviroments will be created on-demand
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Set this value if you want to create a pool of available Orgs. Every time an Org is used, a new org will be created behind the scenes, so the next time an org is desired, it is already available.
If this is not set, the Enviroments will be created on-demand
CustomField.label: Number of desired Available Orgs
